sentences.text: Listen-Communicate-Show -LRB- LCS -RRB- is a new paradigm for human interaction with data sources .
We integrate a spoken language understanding system with intelligent mobile agents that mediate between users and information sources .
We have built and will demonstrate an application of this approach called LCS-Marine .
Using LCS-Marine , tactical personnel can converse with their logistics system to place a supply or information request .
The request is passed to a mobile , intelligent agent for execution at the appropriate database .
Requestors can also instruct the system to notify them when the status of a request changes or when a request is complete .
We have demonstrated this capability in several field exercises with the Marines and are currently developing applications of this technology in new domains .

kg2text: The Listen-Communicate-Show (LCS) is a novel interaction paradigm that enhances human interaction with data sources, specifically through the integration of spoken language understanding and intelligent mobile agents. This approach, also referred to as LCS-Marine, has demonstrated its capabilities in several field exercises, showcasing how tactical personnel can place supply or information requests through a conversational interface. The LCS-Marine application serves as a practical implementation of this capability, allowing Requestors to instruct the system and receive notifications about their requests. Furthermore, the broader applications of this technology extend beyond military logistics, indicating its potential in various domains. Overall, the LCS paradigm represents a significant advancement in facilitating seamless communication between users and data sources.

Tactical personnel place supply or information requests within the logistics system, which is a broader term for the system they interact with. These requests, which can be categorized as a request or an information request, are processed by a mobile, intelligent agent. This agent operates under the umbrella of technology that includes a spoken language understanding system, facilitating communication between users and the logistics system. The status of a request, which indicates its current state, is also a broader term that encompasses the request itself. As the status changes, it reflects whether a request is complete or still pending. Furthermore, intelligent mobile agents mediate interactions between users and the logistics system, ensuring that tactical personnel can effectively converse and manage their supply needs. The technology involved is not only limited to military applications but is also developing new applications across various domains.

Intelligent mobile agents and mobile, intelligent agents are both encompassed under the broader term technology, which integrates various systems to enhance human interaction with data sources. Within this framework, logistics systems are categorized under the broader system, facilitating the management of resources and processes. The spoken language understanding system plays a crucial role as it integrates with intelligent mobile agents, enabling them to effectively mediate between information sources and users. Furthermore, mobile, intelligent agents execute tasks at the appropriate database, which itself is a subset of the broader database category. The concept of new domains also falls under the umbrella of domains, indicating the expansion of technology applications beyond their initial military context. Several field exercises serve as practical demonstrations of these technologies, showcasing their capabilities in real-world scenarios.
